body:
All finished- Thanks for the Awesome model!
Stats on this print 
MakerBot Replicator 2 
MakerBot Cool Gray PLA 
20% infill- 2 shells- .20 mm Layer Height 
Weight- 1lb 1 1/2oz- 495G 
Total Print Time- 37 hours 12 min 
I ran files through NetFabb to make any needed repairs 
I have included all of the pics during the print as well as my notes
body_html:
All finished- Thanks for the Awesome model!
Stats on this print
MakerBot Replicator 2
MakerBot Cool Gray PLA
20% infill- 2 shells- .20 mm Layer Height
Weight- 1lb 1 1/2oz- 495G
Total Print Time- 37 hours 12 min
I ran files through NetFabb to make any needed repairs
I have included all of the pics during the print as well as my notes

body:
Thanks so much for this - it looks great!

I printed this at 70% scale so I lost some of the fine details, but I wanted it to be a small figure.  Print came out about 25mm with the base.

I ended up printing it with supports just because my slicer suggested it - probably could have gotten away with no supports.  The staff got some supports and the hood as well.
body_html:
Thanks so much for this - it looks great!

I printed this at 70% scale so I lost some of the fine details, but I wanted it to be a small figure. Print came out about 25mm with the base.

I ended up printing it with supports just because my slicer suggested it - probably could have gotten away with no supports. The staff got some supports and the hood as well.

body: So. The Earthenkind are absolutely awesome! I am working on an entire table covered in their forces.. I have a question for you. What are the chances of getting forces made up of the other elements? These guys need some mortal enemies in the form of fire, air and water to do combat with....
body_html: So. The Earthenkind are absolutely awesome! I am working on an entire table covered in their forces.. I have a question for you. What are the chances of getting forces made up of the other elements? These guys need some mortal enemies in the form of fire, air and water to do combat with....
